name: currency converter
desc: The Currency Converter project is a software application designed to facilitate the real-time conversion of currencies.

name: Digital clock
desc: This project involves creating a simple digital clock using Python and the Tkinter library for the graphical user interface (GUI).

name: calculator
desc: This project involves creating a graphical user interface (GUI) calculator using Python. The calculator is designed to perform basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

name: Snake game
desc: The Snake Game project is a classic arcade game implemented in Python. In this game, the player controls a snake that moves around the screen, eating food to grow longer while avoiding collisions with the walls and its own tail.

name: Slide showviewer app
desc: The Slideshow Viewer App is a Python-based application designed to facilitate the seamless display of a series of images in a slideshow format. Utilizing libraries such as Tkinter for the graphical user interface.

name: Spotify clone
desc: The Spotify Clone project is a comprehensive web application designed to replicate the core functionalities of Spotify, the popular music streaming service.

name: Portfolio template
desc: This Project Portfolio Template is a comprehensive, customizable tool designed to help individuals and organizations effectively manage and showcase their project work.
